title: Chocolate cake with ganache
ingredients: ['125g unsalted butter', '150g dark brown soft sugar', '3 eggs', '125g self-raising flour, sifted', '4 tablespoons plain flour, sifted', '1/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '30g unsweetened cocoa powder', '100g plain chocolate, melted and cooled', '175ml milk', 'For the Topping', '375g plain chocolate', '175ml double cream', 'chocolate curls and strawberries']
